metadata.title: CVE-2023-32393 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin watchOS 9.3, tvOS 16.3, macOS Ventura 13.2, iOS 16.3 and iPadOS 16.3.Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.40.3-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.40.3-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.40.3-2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.40.3-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.40.3-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.40.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.40.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.40.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.40.3-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.40.3-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.3-2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.40.3-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.40.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40.3-2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
